content:
Hi,

I'm passing the date_frame_maker_full test case, but the data_frame_maker_small is failing because the month is off by one and the data_frame_maker_large is failing because the day is off by one.  Any ideas what is going wrong? I used the get_header and time_before functions to get the start and end date.
subject: data frame maker

content: It is possible something is wrong with some of your helper functions that mightve escaped  the tests. I would recommend going to OH to check this out, since I’m not sure if I have any ideas for what might be wrong until I see the code
